name: DashGuy
description:
Hello !

In this game you will control a little guy who is a DashGuy: he will always dash towards your cursor when you want him to ! Don't worry there is a tutorial in game.

There are 4 levels. Level 4 is a little bit hard.

Good luck !

//Credits//

I'm using EvanKing music for my game because I really can't compose music.

Music: Evan King - Weekly Loops Season 3 (Special Edition) - 02 Loop 71 - Invest

Music: Evan King - Weekly Loops Season 3 (Special Edition) - 18 Loop 79 - Runner

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
